content:
In the following you will be guided through the 
 basic game mechanics. 
 
 This tutotial will take you approximately 999 min.

Here are the default keybindings in the game. 
 You can change them later in the keybindings menu. 
 
 W - move forward 
 A - move left 
 S - move back 
 D - move right 
 LeftShift- sprint 
 E - interaction 
 Cancel - esc
